About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Allow me to introduce myself as an individual passionate about the world of technology and driven by the desire to make a positive impact. My name is Djatcha Franck, and I am a determined Full Stack developer who is committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation. Since a young age, I have been fascinated by how technology transforms our lives and shapes the world around us. I quickly discovered my passion for software development and embraced this path with overwhelming enthusiasm.

WEB

Full Stack Developer

As a Full Stack Developer, I have the opportunity to work on both front-end and back-end development. I create user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, while also handling server-side development with languages like Java or Python. This role allows me to see projects through from start to finish and make informed decisions for delivering high-quality solutions. It's a dynamic and rewarding career that keeps me engaged in the ever-evolving world of technology.

HACK THE BOX

Cybersecurity

As an amateur in cybersecurity, my focus is on developing foundational knowledge and skills in protecting digital systems and data. I am passionate about understanding security principles, learning about common vulnerabilities, and implementing basic security measures. While I may not have extensive professional experience, I am dedicated to expanding my expertise and contributing to maintaining a secure digital environment as an aspiring cybersecurity enthusiast

WEBWORKS

Graphic Designer

As a skilled Graphic Designer, I bring ideas to life through visually compelling designs. With expertise in industry-standard software and a strong grasp of design principles, I create captivating graphics and layouts for print and digital mediums. Collaborating closely with clients, I ensure their brand identity shines through my work. Detail-oriented and innovative, I stay updated with design trends to deliver visually stunning designs that leave a lasting impression. My goal is to bring creativity and strategic thinking to every project, elevating brands and delivering impactful visual solutions.
